nodes.text: The Crest of Alderaan was the emblem of the Alderaanian monarchy. Shaped like an upside-down triangle made of interlacing curves, it notably adorned several elements of Viceroy Bail Organa's wardrobe, and his daughter Princess Leia Organa had a hair clasp shaped like it. It also appeared in the letterhead of mails sent by members of the royal family.
